Legacy Document

Inside Macintosh: Apple Guide Complete / Part - Appendixes
Appendix D - Checklist

Testing Your Guide File

After building your guide file, test it as follows:

  • Test your Look For content (see page 6-7)
  • Test your guide file's interface (see page 6-3)
  • Verify coachmarks, context checks, and event functions (see page 6-12)
  • Do user testing (see page 6-14)
